channel.title: Z508/517 Reset
channel.description: I was adding these codes to FileManager.java and i compiled and Restarted server. When players logged on, they were all level 3 and Lost everything. These are the codes that i added: Under the first Death Count: [code] stream.writeString("cPOINTS: " +p.cashPoints); [/code] Under the second Death Count: [code] stream.writeString("cPOINTS: " +p.cashPoints); [/code] Under the "else if (line.startsWith("DC: "))" [code] stream.writeString("cPOINTS: " +p.cashPoints); [/code] can someone tell me why its resetting the players?

item.title: Z508/517 Reset
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

I was adding these codes to FileManager.java and i compiled and Restarted server.
When players logged on, they were all level 3 and Lost everything.
These are the codes that i added:
Under the first Death Count:

    stream.writeString("cPOINTS: " +p.cashPoints);

Under the second Death Count:

    stream.writeString("cPOINTS: " +p.cashPoints);

Under the "else if (line.startsWith("DC: “))”

    stream.writeString("cPOINTS: " +p.cashPoints);

can someone tell me why its resetting the players?

Read full topic
